title: Tenon Check for Chrome
creator: Tenon LLC
description:
Checks current page in the Tenon accessibility testing tool
This extension adds a button to your browser. Click it, and the page you're currently viewing will be tested for Accessibility against WCAG 2.0 using Tenon.io.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
